name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sherloq - Save, Share & Simplify your queries

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No more saved queries on your notepad or an internal Slack channel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No more saved queries on your notepad or an internal Slack channel. Now you can see all your query history, save your SQL queries, give them meaningful names, share them with your team, and reuse them with just a click of a button
